body_html: Thank you for your feedback, @apaszke and @zou3519. @apaszke, are you sure this is not a memory leakage issue similar to @zou3519? Also, I see no reason why wouldn't PyTorch allocate more than 72G (if needed), knowing that there is 124G available on the node. Still this sounds like too much RAM to me. I remember having similar issues using DIGITS (with Caffe). Do these training sets require that much RAM?
